Text:
please remove the EyeTV first then install again.
EyeTV Reporter - for removing and resetting EyeTV
http://forums.elgato.com/viewtopic.php?f=114&t=4666

the serial is no longer working :(
it worked for the install but after a restart of the app its no longer. "activation key has been invalidated"

I also got the Activation key invalidated after a restart. I removed Eyetv with Cleanapp then reinstalled and used little snitch to block it from phoning home. Its ok at the mo, thanks for this, I would never pay for this software since I can only pick up about 5 channels and I payed out big on my Eyetv 410 device a few years ago. Fuck Elgato!
So how can I stop this from phoning home?

EyeTV 3.2 working serial code

tx2qc-vagmdgz-p3m3nm5-glxzpbg
(note lower cases only!)
Thanks nobody2007, my 3.1.2 activation key had been invalidated yet again and your post helped me out with no downloads needed.
